doc:
Mary Hardy (comedian) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Hardy_(comedian) 0 Mary Veronica Hardy (14 October 1931 – 7 January 1985) was an Australian television and radio presenter, actor and comedian. She was best known for her caustic wit, indifference to authority and tireless ability to ad lib. Mary_Veronica Hardy ( 14_October_1931 – 7_January_1985 ) was an_Australian_television_and_radio_presenter , actor_and_comedian . She was_best_known for her_caustic_wit , indifference to authority and tireless_ability to ad_lib .
